Hey all :) So I know how to generate a random number. ``` player.health = GetRandomInt (3,15) msg ("
You've recovered "+ player.health +"!") ``` but is there a way to use a similar code to subtract health? Like for example... ``` player.health = GetRandomInt (-3,-15) ``` OR maybe ``` player.health = player.health - GetRandomInt (3,15) msg ("
You've lost "+ player.health +"!") ``` I appreciate any help ^_^ Anonynn.
